questions.question: What is a crapweasel?
questions.correct_answer: It’s what Ross calls Rachel’s new romantic interest.
answers: Phoebe’s nickname for her boss.
It’s what Ross calls Rachel’s new romantic interest.
The name of Joey’s favorite restaurant.

questions.question: Use the word floopy in a sentence.
questions.correct_answer: Rachel’s life lacks direction and is totally floopy.
answers: Monica misses her childhood stuffed animal, Floopy.
Phoebe is rocking her new floopy hairstyle.
Rachel’s life lacks direction and is totally floopy.

questions.question: What do we know about the nubbin?
answers: It’s a skin tag in Monica’s armpit.
It’s Chandler’s third nipple.
It’s Rachel’s pregnancy belly button.

questions.question: What does it mean to be breezy?
questions.correct_answer: You play it cool when leaving your ex a voicemail.
answers: You can’t wait to step outside so you can pass gas.
You walk with confidence showing off your new haircut.
You play it cool when leaving your ex a voicemail.

questions.question: Who introduces the word gleba?
answers: Rachel - it’s Emma’s first word.
Ross - it’s the soft tissue of a dinosaur.
Chandler - it’s a new hair product.

questions.question: When should one respond: oh de foof?
answers: When ordering food.
When tired of French lessons.
When complimenting a lady.

questions.question: What type of product is  <span>Ichiban?</span
answers: A stir fry wok on Monica’s wish list.
A Japanese lipstick for men.
Phoebe’s favorite hot tea.

questions.question: Why did Phoebe invent the term nirget?
questions.correct_answer: To rhyme with a song lyric about taking a shower.
answers: To rhyme with a song lyric about eating cheese.
To rhyme with a song lyric about being a surrogate.
To rhyme with a song lyric about taking a shower.

questions.question: What is a transponster?
questions.correct_answer: A wild guess at what Chandler does for a living.
answers: Early ’90s technology that was part pager, part telephone.
A wild guess at what Chandler does for a living.
Another name for Phoebe’s cab.
